Contact.headline: I help turn big ideas into code.
Contact.description: If you have a proposal or a project in mind, I’d love to hear about it.

guiagastronomica.title: Guía Gastronómica Dominicana
guiagastronomica.description: Project developed for ThePostDM, a digital agency managing multiple brands. I designed and built a modern, scalable web experience for one of their clients, prioritizing performance, visual identity, and clarity in navigation.
features: Built with Next.js and TypeScript using a Headless WordPress architecture.
Content managed through WordPress and consumed via GraphQL.
Interactive map developed with React-Leaflet to explore destinations geographically.
Editorial layout focused on storytelling, photography, and cultural identity.
Fully responsive design with Tailwind CSS ensuring performance and accessibility.
Optimized image handling and SEO-oriented structure for content scalability.

neurosinergia.title: Neurosinergia
neurosinergia.description: An ecommerce platform specialized in therapeutic and educational materials. The website allows users to browse, filter, and purchase resources designed for professionals and families, delivering a clear shopping experience.
features: Built with WordPress using WooCommerce for full ecommerce management.
Layout and design created with Elementor, prioritizing visual clarity and content hierarchy.
Product, category, stock, and order management through the admin dashboard.
Payment gateway integration and shipping configuration.
Basic SEO optimization and scalable catalog structure.
Fully responsive interface optimized for mobile devices.

learnwithiok.title: Learn With IOK
learnwithiok.description: An informational portal for an English teacher where students can explore services, methodology, and book lessons. The site combines modern design, performance, and a clear user journey focused on conversion.
features: Built with Next.js and TypeScript using a modern optimized architecture.
Styled with Tailwind CSS, focusing on clean and responsive design.
Calendly integration for automated lesson booking.
Deployed on Vercel with strong performance and fast loading times.
SEO-optimized structure and accessibility best practices.
Typed and well-structured codebase for maintainability and scalability.

photoscape.title: Photoscape
photoscape.description: Freelance project for a private client who needed a modern and functional website to showcase their landscaping services. The site was designed to emphasize visual appeal, fast performance, and ease of navigation across all devices.
features: Responsive layout focused on highlighting high-quality project images.
SEO-friendly interface built with Next.js for speed and visibility.
Clean and modern styling with Tailwind CSS.
Smooth navigation with full responsiveness across screen sizes.
Dynamic sections for services, portfolio, and contact information.

m4life.title: M4Life
m4life.description: Institutional website for M4Life, a startup specializing in microbiological solutions for agriculture and the environment. The project focused on creating a professional online presence with a clean design and seamless user experience.
features: Brand identity design through colors, typography, and visuals.
Custom mockups created in Figma and refined with client feedback.
Clean, intuitive UI with subtle visual effects.
Fully responsive layout for mobile, tablet, and desktop.
Contact form integrated with EmailJS for direct communication.

movies.title: Movies App
movies.description: A modern web app for discovering trending movies with a responsive and engaging interface. The app dynamically highlights what’s popular based on real user searches, offering a personalized experience.
features: Trending section that updates dynamically from user behavior.
REST API integration with Appwrite for real-time data.
Responsive UI styled with Tailwind CSS.
Dynamic filtering and search for a smooth exploration.
Deployed with Vercel for performance and scalability.

map.title: Interactive Map
map.description: Interactive map application built as a technical challenge to visualize geospatial data. Designed with React and Leaflet, it offers an intuitive way to explore regions with interactive layers and details.
features: Dynamic GeoJSON data loading from public assets.
Multiple map layers including roads and boundaries.
Interactive zones with hover highlights and info panel.
Responsive design optimized for all devices.

pokemon.title: Pokemon
pokemon.description: Full-stack web application developed at Henry Bootcamp to explore and manage a catalog of Pokémon cards. The app combines search, filtering, and CRUD features in a playful yet functional interface.
features: Pokémon cards displayed with pagination (12 per page).
Search by name, sort by alphabet or attack strength.
Filter by type and origin (API or custom).
Create new Pokémon with a validated form.
Detail view with edit and delete options.

sportiverse.title: Sportiverse
sportiverse.description: Full-stack web application developed with a team to make appointments in a sports club and manage the reservations as an admin. The app combines search, filtering, and CRUD features, also authentication and payments using Mercado Pago.
features: Pokémon cards displayed with pagination (12 per page).
Search by name, sort by alphabet or attack strength.
Filter by type and origin (API or custom).
Create new Pokémon with a validated form.
Detail view with edit and delete options.

coinly.title: Coinly
coinly.description: A mobile application built with React Native and Expo that consumes real-time cryptocurrency data from the CoinGecko API. It allows users to track current coin values, search by name, and save favorites. Data fetching and caching are handled efficiently using TanStack Query, ensuring a smooth and responsive user experience.

movieapp.title: Movie App
movieapp.description: A mobile application designed to explore movies using The Movie Database (TMDB) API. Features a card-based layout and an animated carousel powered by React Native Reanimated Carousel. Data management is handled with TanStack Query and the application structure is fully typed with TypeScript.
